text:
Hey <@U07MV7X7SVA>,
if you're in the design manager, you can right-click on the theme and copy it to a different account.
Note: This works only for themes that are *not* in the `@HubSpot` or `@marketplace` .

If you're working with CLI, you can fetch the theme with `hs fetch --account=LIVE-ACCOUNT-ID theme-name local-theme-name` and upload it with `hs upload --account=DEV-ACCOUNT-ID local-theme-name theme-name`
